remarks: A vector belongs to the span of its singleton.  ( ~ spansnid analog.) (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lspsnid.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnid.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnid $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> X e. ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
